verses.1: Pasian aw, keimah hong hon khia nuam in. Topa aw, keimah a huh dingin hong manlang in.
verses.2: Kei, thah hong sawmte maizumin kibuai gawpsak in. Keima siat nading a deihte nungkiksak inla, mindaisak in.
verses.3: “Ha, ha!” a cite a maizumna uh tawh maikhingsak in.
verses.4: Nang hong zongte khempeuh lungdam mahmah in na min hangin kipak tahen. Na hotkhiat ding a utte in, “Pasian lian hi,” cici tahen.
verses.5: Ahih hangin kei zawngin ka cimawh hi. Pasian aw, hong manlang in. Nang pen keimah huhpa le hong hon khia pa na hi hi. Topa aw, hong zekai kei in.
